lines.text: Well... if the wizard needed those tattoos to cast their spells, then...
Well, maybe the dead wizard made a house call to a tattoo artist?
And that tattoo artist... cast a hologram spell, to use as like a model for how the tattoos would look?
But they ran away or died or something before they could dispel it?
They never got around to putting the tattoos on the hologram, either, it looks like.
...No. Without evidence, that much detail is just a load of guesswork.
Then quit makin' stuff up and try somethin' else.
